definitions: A tool for designing, building, and documenting RESTful APIs.
A set of open-source tools built around the OpenAPI Specification that helps you design, build, and document REST APIs.
examples: Swagger UI provides a web-based UI that can generate documentation from an OpenAPI Specification.
Many developers use Swagger Codegen to generate server stubs and client SDKs.
The team decided to use Swagger for their new API project.
